unalcol.evolution.haea

Class CellularHaeaStep<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.search.population.PopulationSearch<T>
      • unalcol.evolution.haea.HaeaStep<T>
        • unalcol.evolution.haea.CellularHaeaStep<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Search<T>

    public class CellularHaeaStep<T>
extends HaeaStep<T>

    Title: CAHAEAStrategy

    Description: The Cellular Automata based Hybrid Adaptive Evolutionary Algorithm Offspring Generation strategy as proposed by Cantor and Gomez in , Proceedings of WCCI 2010.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez
